body_html: I also have one question. Some ops have derivatives defined with .reciprocal() and some ops have derivatives with a direct division (div or /). Is there any difference between .reciprocal() and the standard div?
body_text: I also have one question. Some ops have derivatives defined with .reciprocal() and some ops have derivatives with a direct division (div or /). Is there any difference between .reciprocal() and the standard div?
body: I also have one question. Some ops have derivatives defined with `.reciprocal()` and some ops have derivatives with a direct division (`div` or `/`). Is there any difference between `.reciprocal()` and the standard `div`?
